subject: Look to make a purchase
description_text:
Hey,

I was looking at buying some pedals from you guys and just had a quick
question before I went ahead with the purchase. As a Canadian will I have
to worried about getting other shipping fees at my door or do I not need to
worry about that?

Thank

Daley

conversations.body_text: Hi Daley Pierce,    Our product prices already include shipping costs. However, when shipping from the US or China to Canada, there may be customs duties that you would need to pay. That said, itâ€™s not guaranteed that you will always be charged duties.

Ah ok,

So pretty much have to just take the chance I guess. If whatever happens
and I want to do a refund/return, are the return shipping costs on me?

Thanks

Daley


On Wed, Jul 30, 2025, 7:01 p.m. support@simsonn.com
Hi Daley Pierce,    Don't worry, shipping to Canada usually does not incur any taxes. Regarding returns, if the product is defective, we will cover all costs.
